Academically Successful while reaching limits that you didn't know you could reach. Financially high for an average adult that has no savings or source for obtaining additional funding other than outside sources.
pageTitle: Houghton College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {61223=This college has a very friendly atmosphere - people talk to you even if they don't know you when you're visiting campus. It is a smaller schooler, about 1100 students, so you can get to know just about everyone in your class if you want to. And it's way out in the middle of nowhere, so if you're there, chances are that you want to be there. :-), 140063=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: Categories Comments Tips for prospective students Apply early. Also because of the price look for scholarships. If you email the financial workers they will be more than willing to help you find scholarships that apply directly to you. Bang for the buck Even though Houghton is expensive. The price you pay for the education is worth it. Am enjoying being here The atmosphere here is awesome. Coming from the Philippines, I thought that the transtition would be difficult. I was dreading coming to college because I did not know anybody. However, when I got here I was surprised by how nice the people treat you. They were really open and made my transition easy. Also the teacher's take time to take interest in your life Am learning a lot I went to a Christian High School in the Philippines and when I started looking for colleges I wanted to go to a Christian College, but I also wanted a college that would fully prepare me for my career. When I applied to Houghton I heard that it was difficult. However, when I actually got here it was really challenging. The professors teach alot of information but since
